thread.section_title: Government Policy, Business and Technology: i360 Gov
thread.title: Pittsburgh launches 'inclusive innovation' roadmap

title: Pittsburgh launches 'inclusive innovation' roadmap
text:
10 Pittsburgh launches 'inclusive innovation' roadmap 
Pittsburgh Post-Gazette: Flanked by city government officials, tech business representatives and nonprofit and higher-education leaders in a packed room at the Carnegie Library in East Liberty Tuesday afternoon, Mayor Bill Peduto laid out his administration’s “Roadmap for Inclusive Innovation,” described as a strategic plan to “support equitable access to technology, city resources and information.”The plan will be spearheaded by the city’s Urban Redevelopment Authority and the Department of Innovation and Performance, formerly City Information Systems before it was rechristened by Mr. Peduto in his first months in office.
